name: non_prod_uat_gold_zone.dynamic_notification
description: This table stores dynamic notifications related to job executions and their associated data.

columns.name: job_id
columns.description: Unique identifier for the job associated with the notification.

columns.name: data
columns.description: The data or content of the notification.

columns.name: run_date
columns.description: The date when the job was executed.

columns.name: query
columns.description: The query used to generate or retrieve data for the notification.

columns.name: registry_postgres_table
columns.description: The name of the registry table in PostgreSQL related to the notification.

columns.name: key_template
columns.description: Template used for generating the key for the notification.

columns.name: value_template
columns.description: Template used for generating the value for the notification.
